Items.Title: All items reported out of the Subcommittees.

Application No. 20215009 SCK (475-Seat Intermediate School Facility) submitted pursuant to Section 1732 of the New York School Construction Authority Act, concerning the proposed site selection for a new, approximately 475-Seat Intermediate School Facility located at 4002 Ft. Hamilton Parkway (Block 5587, p/o Lot 38), Borough of Brooklyn, Council District 39, Community School District 15.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
